it.polito.verifoo.rest.medicine

Class MedicineSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.verifoo.rest.medicine.MedicineSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PhyResourceModel

    public class MedicineSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements PhyResourceModel
    This class runs the SONATA simulation for a physical topology. The used version of the SONATA module is the v3.0
